data.comment: The match is underway in Yokohama.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 5, Michael Olunga is on target to give Kashiwa a 0-1 advantage.
Cristiano instrumental with a fine assist.
Can Yokohama FC get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the away team in Yokohama.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a throw-in for Yokohama FC, close to Kashiwa's area.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in their own half.
In the minute 9, Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
Throw-in Yokohama FC.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 18, Yokohama FC surge into the attack at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium but Yutaro Hakamataâ€™s header is off-target.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Tadashi Nakamura awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC in their own half.
Yokohama FC to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Can Yokohama FC capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
In the minute 23, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Kashiwa will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Yokohama FC.
Yusuke Matsuo for Yokohama FC gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 25, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Maguinho (Yokohama FC) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 28, Yokohama FC pushes forward through Yusuke Matsuo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In the minute 32, Yokohama FC's Yuji Senuma misses with an attempt on goal.
Tadashi Nakamura awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 33, Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) has received a first yellow card.
In Yokohama Kashiwa's Cristiano is caught offside.
Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
In the minute 38, Kashiwa are coming forward and Michael Olunga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In Yokohama, Takuya Matsuura of Yokohama FC is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 39, Kashiwa advance rapidly upfield but Tadashi Nakamura blows for offside.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashiwa's Michael Olunga gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 41, Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Tadashi Nakamura blows against Kashiwa's Cristiano for offside.
Kashiwa drives forward and Richardson gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second half has started at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Yokohama FC have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 48, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 51, The away team have replaced Yuta Kamiya with Hayato Nakama. This is the first substitution made today by Nelsinho Baptista.
Yokohama FC are pushing forward but Yutaro Hakamata's finish is wide of the goal.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 52, Cristiano of Kashiwa is pulled up for offside.
Michael Olunga of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Yokohama FC goal kick.
In the minute 54, Yokohama FC's Leandro Domingues is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
Free kick Kashiwa.
In the minute 55, Maguinho (Yokohama FC) gets a yellow card.
Tadashi Nakamura waits before resuming play because Cristiano for Kashiwa is still down.
Cristiano is back on the pitch.
In the minute 57, Michael Olunga's header is off-target for Kashiwa.
Tadashi Nakamura awards Yokohama FC a goal kick.
Kazunari Ichimi is replacing Yuji Senuma for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 57, Takahiro Shimotaira is making the team's second substitution at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium with Koki Saito replacing Takuya Matsuura.
Yokohama FC have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
Hiroto Goya (Kashiwa) has replaced the possibly injured Cristiano at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in high up the field for Yokohama FC in Yokohama.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Reo Yasunaga for Yokohama FC has been booked by Tadashi Nakamura and receives a first yellow card.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 64, Tadashi Nakamura awards the away team a throw-in.
Tadashi Nakamura awards Kashiwa a goal kick.
Kashiwa's Hayato Nakama breaks free at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Yokohama FC awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 69, Hayato Nakama (Kashiwa) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Yokohama.
In Yokohama a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 71, Yokohama FC drive upfield and Leandro Domingues gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashiwa defender.
Yusuke Matsuo of Yokohama FC smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Yokohama FC are caught offside.
In the minute 73, Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Yokohama FC have an attacking throw-in.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a Yokohama FC throw-in in Kashiwa's half.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Kashiwa take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Michael Olunga.
That's a fine assist from Naoki Kawaguchi.
Yokohama FC's Reo Yasunaga breaks free at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 78, Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Tatsuki Seko is on a sub for Reo Yasunaga for Yokohama FC.
Takahiro Shimotaira (Yokohama FC) is making a fourth substitution, with Kosuke Saito replacing Leandro Domingues.
In the minute 79, Tadashi Nakamura signals a Kashiwa throw-in in Yokohama FC's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yokohama FC's Kazunari Ichimi misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 80, Kashiwa have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Yokohama FC close to the penalty box.
Yokohama FC push upfield but Tadashi Nakamura quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Yokohama FC in the half of Kashiwa.
Tadashi Nakamura signals a free kick to Kashiwa in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Maguinho (Yokohama FC) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 86, Yokohama FC make their fifth substitution with Yusuke Minagawa replacing Kensuke Sato.
Corner awarded to Yokohama FC.
In the minute 88, Goal kick for Yokohama FC at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Nelsinho Baptista (Kashiwa) is making a third substitution, with Tatsuya Yamashita replacing Kengo Kitazume.
The away team replace Masatoshi Mihara with Hidekazu Otani.
Hiroto Goya of Kashiwa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Kashiwa have been awarded a corner by Tadashi Nakamura.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Yokohama.
Free kick Yokohama FC.
Hiroto Goya (Kashiwa) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Free kick for Yokohama FC in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Kashiwa are whistled for offside.
Full-time! The final score is 0-3.
Hidekazu Otani heads in to give Kashiwa a 0-3 lead at NHK Spring MitsuzawaFootballStadium.
Naoki Kawaguchi with an assist there.
